server.host: The host to bind the server to. Set to 0.0.0.0 to bind to all available network interfaces.
server.port: The port to listen on. Defaults to 5000.

network.polygon_rpc_url: The URL of the Polygon RPC endpoint. Defaults to https://polygon-rpc.com.

wallet.address: The address of the wallet to use. Replace with your own wallet address.
wallet.private_key: The private key of the wallet to use. Replace with your own private key.

logging.level: The log level. One of DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR, CRITICAL. Defaults to INFO.
logging.file: The log file to write to. Defaults to log.txt.

contracts.pol_address: The address of the POL token contract. Defaults to 0x9c6687882c2EaF9F1F0B9f44f7f4B21aFb34Db2.
contracts.dai_address: The address of the DAI token contract. Defaults to 0x6B175474E89094C44Da98b954EedeAC495271d0F.
contracts.router_address: The address of the UniswapV2Router contract. Defaults to 0xA478c2975Ab1eaA0e77d664e344f31F24E756fBD.

uniswap.router_abi_path: The path to the UniswapV2Router ABI file. Defaults to abi/uniswap-v2-router.json.

auto_rebalance.enabled: Whether to enable the auto rebalance feature. Defaults to true.

insights.enabled: Whether to enable the insights feature. Defaults to true.
